description: A military operation authorized by the highest levels of the World Government to completely obliterate a target using a fleet of battleships. Spandam possesses the Golden Den Den Mushi that can summon a Buster Call.

keyMoments.title: Robin Questions Spandam's Buster Call Authority
keyMoments.description: Robin questions why Spandam was given the authority to call a Buster Call, which angers him and leads to him beating her.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the significance of the Buster Call and foreshadows its use later in the arc.

keyMoments.title: Buster Call Triggers Ohara Flashback
keyMoments.description: Mention of the Buster Call triggers Robin's traumatic memories of the Ohara incident.
keyMoments.significance: Links the past Buster Call on Ohara to the present threat at Enies Lobby.

significance: The ultimate weapon of the World Government, capable of destroying entire islands. Symbol of absolute power and the source of Robin's deepest trauma.
